body: It’s clearly a different person, even the eye and hair color is slightly different

WAIT, WHAT? ... it's been suggested here and elsewhere that this story's FMC is NOT Satsuki from "Satsuki Onee-chan to Issho ni Benkyou Shiyo" (by same artist), but another (rather similar) looking girl named Yutsuki. Well, will await the English translation to be sure.
Fuuuuuuuck!!! Be damned mosaic censorship! Why oryou switched from bar censors to mosaic? >:(

@boykami: There is no part 1. I checked ALL of Oryou's previous works and none of the characters are the same as this one (at first glance, new fans to Oryou's art will have a hard time telling apart but there are obvious distinct fringes among the forehead bangs, hair clips or not, and eye shapes/colors). Ok, let's wait for the TL to this God-tier art.
Waiting for translation this is part two right I think there is a part one of this
GOD DAYUM! ... that Sexy Onee-san Satsuki-nee has returned ..... "AND IT IS GLORIOUS!" Waiting patiently for the English translation.
Fuckton of shota today and now even oryou.
Fucking finally, a new Oryou manga!
